## Description {#details}

Base class for scope-like contexts.

Base class for lexical scopes and types (which are also declaration contexts).

TODO: Separate the concepts of declaration contexts and lexical scopes.

Definition at line 519 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.

### getRawFile() {#ad75ba27f93c5b4df5cdc8db8a0dcd4a7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Metadata &#42; llvm::DIScope::getRawFile () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the raw underlying file.

A <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/difile">DIFile</a></em> is a <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/discope">DIScope</a></em>, but it doesn&#39;t point at a separate file (it <em>is</em> the file). If <code>this</code> is an <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/difile">DIFile</a></em>, we need to return <code>this</code>. Otherwise, return the first operand, which is where all other subclasses store their file pointer.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h/#l00542">542</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
